name: Escort Hero (HarmoMo)
description:
Control your heroes to fight enemies coming from above.

Slide the heroes horizontally to change their position against the enemies to protect the item.  (In the future, we may add more items or people to protect!)

Each hero has unique traits, skills, and combat behavior. Use them wisely to defeat enemies.

You lose the game when the item you're protecting is destroyed.

The game could be a bit challenging! Please let me know what you think of the gameplay!

Tips
  • Click "Start" to play.
  • Hold and Slide the hero below.
  • The Enemies will attack the heroes marked by the red area.
  • Play on Full Screen for a better experience!

This version is the sister version of Sliding Hero which I made a couple of months ago.
